greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Möbius transform of A320107.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} A008683(n/d) * A320107(d), where A008683 is Möbius mu-function.
program: A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 22 2018
